    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# Here
There are total of 15 columns with 40000 rows out of which
* key- categorical, 
* audio_mode-categorical,
* time_signature-categorical,
* songpopularity is also categorical column which is our Target column
* and rest -10 are continuous
* ID column is our IDs of songs
